segments.text: What kind of place shall we rent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should be close to the university . Neither of us are good at getting up in the mornings and closer it is , the later we can get up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . That's the most important thing to take into consideration . I'm not too worried about the size of the flat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Neither am I . so a small place is ok , but we'll get a bigger one if it's not expensive . Do you mind if it's in a noisy area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't mind . I'm not a light sleeper , but quieter is better for when we have to study at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good point . Ok , let's go to the estate agent and see what they can offer us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if we're lucky we'll find something in the next few days . I think you had a good idea to start flat hunting early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you think the rent will be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I asked a few people who are already living in places near the university and they said it would cost about one hundred pounds a month .
segments.speaker: S1
